title: Keeping Secrets and Calling Out Haters
description:
Lauren & Jeremy dive into the secret languages and ridiculous nicknames couples invent for each other. Jeremy goes on a tangent about girth and perfect proportions. Lauren calls out her beef with an internet troll and her brain. 

Go to FunctionofBeauty.com/WILD9 to let them know we sent you, and to get 20% off your order. 
As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/WT9
Join Thrive Market today to get 25% off your first order AND an exclusive FREE gift! The ONLY way to get this offer is by going to ThriveMarket.com/WILD.

If you like the show, telling a friend about us would be helpful. You can email, or share this link to a friend: https://link.chtbl.com/WildTil9?at=1010lSCj
